definitions.definition: A rail which can be held, such as on the side of a staircase , ramp or other walkway , and serving as a support or guard.
A moving continuous belt-like rail on either side of an escalator which users can hold on to for support.

main_definition: A rail which can be held, such as on the side of a staircase , ramp or other walkway , and serving as a support or guard.
secondary_definitions: A moving continuous belt-like rail on either side of an escalator which users can hold on to for support.
